tool_description: Conducts interactive mock interview sessions, recording candidate responses and capturing behavioral indicators for comprehensive evaluation.
error_messages: Empty questions array: Provide at least one interview question
Invalid time limit: Set time_limit_per_question between 30 and 600 seconds
Invalid interview mode: Use one of [structured, conversational, stress]
Questions array too large: Maximum 30 questions allowed
usage: Provide questions array and optionally set time_limit_per_question and interview_mode. The tool simulates an interview session and records responses.

response_times.description: Time taken for each response in seconds
